channel.title: [525] Server + Client
channel.description:
Hello,
Well i do not give permsion for people to post the link on this site for the server i will get your post deleted stright away:
Features: Login
Dats all lol
Put it on a rs2d and added some shit to it to make it more stabile blah blah blah
Download: http://rsdev.no-ip.org/showthread.php?t=50
~T X
Will be realsing Render, Walking, interfaces blah blah blah later on tonight when i have time

item.title: [525] Server + Client
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

[quote=“yourusername, post:27, topic:256023”]Hello,

Server: http://rsdev.no-ip.org/RsDev525.rar

Client: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=UZEMM7B6

Todo: Add render, Interfaces, Setitems

~Gore

21: close interface
89: setskill
236: setitems
35: send message
168: send private message
220: receive private message
103: possibly hint icons -100%
202: update player movement? -95% Tested
189: create ground item
110: remove ground item
144: setoptions (used for trade options, bank options, shop options)
80: Click on a tab to make it active/deactive - 75% chance
85: Set config, tested by clicking options… 100%
35: Open up enter chat thingy - can also be send message? 50%
84: Load world map… 100%
35: Send message…100%
25: Chat head icons… 100%
21: Hides duel or pk battle axe/skull on top right corner(real: removes all interfaces) 100%
138: Shows duel/pk icons on top right corner (might be setinterface)… 100%
103: maybe hinticons? use from 1-10 first parameter and second should be index? 50%
144: Show interface, maybe also 184? STRIKE 0%
191: Item trading for shops, trade, items kept on death, Follower NPC inventory w/e, 100%
Im not going to make someone join a website to download it -.- btw this was from the website so take the dls.[/quote]

Idk any real programmer never releases half ass shit, so work on it and complete it if your going too… If not keep it to yourself…

Read full topic

item.title: [525] Server + Client
item.dc:creator: @Different1 Different`
item.description:
@Different1 wrote:

First of all, it’s impossible to run the server and the client. TX is known to be a keylogger. My point of view is this:

TX releases the server and client in total knowing of the fact that the server can’t be run properly, and the client is in a different format, therefor can’t be run unless you buy the the software to view the format.

That’s the way I see it, otherwise it’s just a big keylogger and you’re all fucked for downloading it. Crack is whack, kids.
